Detailed Description

Syntax node elements.

Syntax node elements are element that accepts child elements. They store a list of possible childs, and offer operations based on this list.

Element::List &  CLI_NearList,
const char *const   STR_Keyword 
) const [virtual]

Returns the list of child elements coresponding to a keyword or the beginning of a keyword.

Parameters:
CLI_ExactList  Exact matching keywords output list.
CLI_NearList  All matching keywords output list.
STR_Keyword  Keyword or beginning of a keyword. NULL means no keyword begun.
